<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#restore_with_ttl_disabled_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">restore_<wbr>with_<wbr>ttl_<wbr>disabled</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies whether the restored account will have Time-To-Live disabled upon the successful restore.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

## Import



An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:cosmosdb:DatabaseAccountMongoDBDatabase updatedDatabaseName /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/{accountName}/apis/mongodb/databases/{databaseName} 
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
